maqras.text: Ini: "a yimdanen iw i ipeawalen mgal iman nnsen! Ur ppayset aeunu n Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Ipsemmie akw ibekkaven. Ih, Neppa Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Steooaet i Mass nnwen, anzet aS, uqbel a kwen id ias uaaqeb, d$a ula ikwen isellken
Ddut d uuam n wayen i wen d irsen, s$uo Mass nnwen, uqbel a kwen id ias uaaqeb, deqzalla, kunwi ur tebnim
u a d yini ooue: "a ssexv iw, $ef wayen stehza$ ar loiha n Oebbi! Lli$, s tidep, seg wid ittihin
Ne$ a d yini: "lemmer iyi Inha Oebbi, yili lli$ seg wid ipeezziben
Ne$ a d yini mara iwali aaaqeb: "lemmer iyi illi wallus, ad ili$ si lauuam
Xaii! Usan k id issekniyen iW, teskaddbev ten, tzuxxev, telliv seg ijehliyen
Ass n tnekra, a pwaliv berrikit wudmawen n wid id igren tikerkas af Oebbi. Day macci di Loahennama, i illa uxxam imzuxiyen
Ad Isellek Oebbi wid ieezzben; ar rebeen. Ur ten ikkat wugur, ur $webbnen
Oebbi Ixleq yal cci. Neppa d Awkil n yal cci
IneS tsura n tmurt akked igenwan. Wid inekoen issekniyen n Oebbi, widak d imexsuoen
Ini: "day ad yi tamoem ad aabde$, war Oebbi, a wid ur nessin
Ni$ iusa k id uweeei, u $eo wid i k izwaren. Ma tcurkev, ad meun igiten ik, a ppiliv seg imexsuoen
Xaii! Aabed Oebbi. Ili seg wid isnemmiren
Ur qudoen ara Oebbi, azal n lqedo iS. Akw tamurt, ass n tnekra, di tumeet iS. Igenwan ad nnefvasen deg ufus iS ayeffus. Gedha s yiS! I Aalay sennig wayen pcaraken
Auuvu di lbuq: ad ixsef i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, kkes ed i S ihwan i Oebbi. Auuvu nniven: nitni a d kkren pmuqulen
A pfeooeo tmurt, si tafat n Mass is. A d ters Tezmamt, a d awin lambiyya akked inagan. Ad aaddin di ccoaa, s tidep, ur pwadensen
Yal yiwen ad i$ellet ayen ixdem. Neppa, Yif akw akken Issen, d acu xeddmen

Ad pwanehoen wid ijehlen, d igrawen, ar Loahennama. Mi bbwven $uoes, u llint tebbura s, ad asen inin iassasen is: "day ur kwen in usan ara imazanen, segwen, mmalen awen issekniyen n Mass nnwen, nedoen kwen af temlilit n wass nnwen agi"? A d inin: "Ih. Maca, ad iuao wawal uaaqeb, af ijehliyen
A d inin: "kecmet si tebbura, ar Loahennama! Degs, wekkoet". Ay d ucmit uxxam n imzuxiyen
Wid ieezzben i Mass nnsen, ad pwanehoen ar Loennet, d igrawen. Mi bbwven $uoes, u llint tebbura s, ad asen inin iassasen is: "tifrat fellawen, tgerzem; kecmet ep, twekkoem
Ad inin: "ccekoan i Oebbi i $ Issawven lemaahda S. Ifka ya$ tamurt d lweot; a nili, di Loennet, anda i $ ihwa. A yarraz asaadi n wid ixeddmen lxio
A pwaliv lmalayek zzint ed i usgeld, sbuccuaent s ccekoan Mass nnsent. Iaadda ccoaa garasen, s tidep. Ad inin: "a neckeo Oebbi, Mass imavalen
